ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Frotas.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Frotas.Definicoes.Entidades import MFOrdemServico
form = widget.ProviderWidget if form == None: return entity = form.Entity if entity == None: return
tipoOrdem = entity.Fields["TIPOORDEMMANUTENCAO"].ToString()
if not MFOrdemServico.TemQuestionario(tipoOrdem): widget.Hidden = True
